Package com.teamone.unitask.hyperlinks

Class HyperlinkController

java.lang.Object
com.teamone.unitask.hyperlinks.HyperlinkController
@CrossOrigin(origins="http://localhost:3000/", maxAge=3600L, allowCredentials="true") @RestController @RequestMapping("/hyperlinks") public class HyperlinkController extends Object
Controller class for the Hyperlink page.

  • Constructor Details

    • HyperlinkController

  • Method Details

    • createHyperlink

      @PostMapping("/createHyperlink/{projectTitle}") public org.springframework.http.ResponseEntity<Hyperlink> createHyperlink(@RequestBody Hyperlink hyperlink, @PathVariable("projectTitle") String projectTitle)
      POST method that takes a Hyperlink object and the project title as input. If the project title is valid, save the Hyperlink object to the database and return the Hyperlink object with HttpStatus.CREATED. Otherwise, return null and HttpStatus.BAD_REQUEST.

    • getAllHyperlinks

      @GetMapping("/getAllHyperlinks/{projectTitle}") public org.springframework.http.ResponseEntity<List<Hyperlink>> getAllHyperlinks(@PathVariable("projectTitle") String projectTitle)
      GET method that takes the project title as input. Returns all the Hyperlinks of the given project and HttpStatus.OK if the given project title is valid. Otherwise, return null and HttpStatus.BAD_REQUEST.

    • updateHyperlink

      @PutMapping("/editHyperlink/{id}") public org.springframework.http.ResponseEntity<Hyperlink> updateHyperlink(@PathVariable("id") Long hyperlinkId, @RequestBody Hyperlink hyperlink)
      PUT method that takes the hyperlinkId and a new hyperlink object as input. Modifies the existing hyperlink in the database. If successfully modified, return the modified hyperlink object and HttpStatus.OK. Otherwise, throw the ResourceNotFoundException.

    • deleteHyperlink

      @DeleteMapping("/deleteHyperlink/{id}") public org.springframework.http.ResponseEntity<Hyperlink> deleteHyperlink(@PathVariable("id") Long hyperlinkId)
      DELETE method that takes a hyperlink id as the input and removes it from the database. If the given hyperlink id is invalid, throw the ResourceNotFoundException.
